title: Unfurnished 3 Bedroom Apartment near Galle Face Green for Sale
details:
Modern 3 bedroom apartment with all the facilities now available for sale on the 6th floor of a Condo build recently.The location is walking distance to all the star class hotels in the City and Galle Face Green.It also near the up and coming Port City & the Keels water front called Cinnamon Life.

The apartment comes with 3 bedrooms with the master bedroom,dressing area with en-suite, TV lounge, Sitting & Living, Pantry and Maids Quarters.

Quoted Price : LKR 55 Million[Negotiable]

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
